Void.name: Unstable Rift
Void.desc: Gain an unstable completed item that pops off and transforms into a random item every round.

Void.name: The Rupture
Void.desc: Travel to a random location that is not currently shown.

Void.name: The Hall Of The Nine
Void.desc: At the start of each stage, everyone gets the same loot from a highly varied pool.

Bandle City.name: Scuttle Puddle
Bandle City.desc: PvE monsters are replaced by scuttle crabs that grant extra loot.

Bandle City.name: Yuumi\'s Zoom Zone
Bandle City.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2.

Bandle City.name: Bandle Cafeteria
Bandle City.desc: Gain a Spatula on stage 2-1. Each round, champions equipped with Spatulas feed Poro Snax to their closest ally and grant them 20 permanent Health for each Spatula component they have.

Demacia.name: House Lightshield
Demacia.desc: Gain a Crown of Demacia on stage 2-1. If the holder dies, you instantly lose the fight.

Demacia.name: Ehrenmount
Demacia.desc: Gain 3 component anvils at the start of the game.

Freljord.name: Hearth-Home
Freljord.desc: On stage 4-5, gain a Masterwork Upgrade consumable that lets you upgrade one equipped item into its radiant version.

Freljord.name: Ornn\'s Forge
Freljord.desc: Randomly on either stage 2-5 or 3-5, gain an Ornn Item Anvil.

Freljord.name: Valar\'s Hollow
Freljord.desc: In Valar’s Hollow, you’ll gain an Item Anvil on 2-3 and a Support Anvil on 3-3.

Ionia.name: The Dreaming Pool
Ionia.desc: At the start of each stage, gain a champ that really fits your team!

Ionia.name: God-Willow\'s Grove
Ionia.desc: A spot on your bench becomes the grove. The unit in it contributes their traits as though they were in your army.

Ionia.name: Placidium Library
Ionia.desc: Gain a Scroll of Knowledge on stage 3-5. Use it on a champion to open an armory offering every emblem that matches their traits.

Noxus.name: Noxkraya
Noxus.desc: Each time you take an augment, a random arena hex appears. Units on an arena hex gain an item that they can use.

Noxus.name: Immortal Bastion
Noxus.desc: On stage 2-1, gain a placeable battle flag that grants 20% Attack Speed and a 20% max Health shield to units that start combat adjacent to it.

Noxus.name: Fleshing Arena
Noxus.desc: Twice per stage, get a free high-tier champion. The champion\'s tier increases with game time.

Piltover.name: Jayce\'s Workshop
Piltover.desc: All augments offered this game will be prismatic.

Piltover.name: The University
Piltover.desc: The first augment offered this game will be prismatic.

Piltover.name: Stillwater Hold
Piltover.desc: Whenever you would be offered an augment, gain a completed item anvil instead.

Shadow Isles.name: Thresh\'s Sanctum
Shadow Isles.desc: When ANY unit dies, collect their soul. Every 40 souls, gain a loot orb.

Shadow Isles.name: Yorick\'s Graveyard
Shadow Isles.desc: Every time a player dies, all players open an armory containing 4 of the eliminated players\' completed items.

Shurima.name: Warlord\'s Palace
Shurima.desc: Stage 4-7 is replaced by a treasure armory round. Each reroll costs 2.

Shurima.name: Shuriman Bazaar
Shurima.desc: Each champion on a component carousel has 2 components on them instead of 1.

Shurima.name: Shifting Sands
Shurima.desc: At the start of every round, champions on the @BenchSlots@ rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

Targon.name: The Summit
Targon.desc: Starting at stage 3, gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of each stage. On stage 5 and beyond, gain a Champion Duplicator instead.

Targon.name: Targon Prime
Targon.desc: When you reach 40 Health, receive a blessing from the Targonian gods.

Targon.name: Marus Omegnum
Targon.desc: On stage 2-5 and 4-5, gain a Tactician\'s Crown.

Zaun.name: The Sump
Zaun.desc: There is no interest this game. Instead, starting on stage 2-1, gain 3 gold every round.

Zaun.name: Glasc Industries
Zaun.desc: Every time you build a completed item, gain 3 gold.

Zaun.name: Ecliptic Vaults
Zaun.desc: Every time you select an augment, gain 4 gold per augment you have.

Bilgewater.name: Finn’s Market
Bilgewater.desc: Round 3-7 is replaced by a visit to Bilgewater Trader Finn, who will stock either Completed, Artifact, Support, or Radiant items. You can choose one to keep for free!

Bilgewater.name: Slaughter Docks
Bilgewater.desc: At the Slaughter Docks, you’ll gain free shop rerolls equal to the stage number plus 1 at the start of each stage! These only last for the round you get them, so star up your units and polish off those comps!

Bilgewater.name: Rat Town
Bilgewater.desc: Starting in Stage 2, Lucky Shops can appear randomly at the start of a round once per stage. These shops feature units tailored to your army\'s active traits. There’s no discount here, but you’ll save a heck-of-a-lot in rerolls.

Ixtal.name: Serpentine River
Ixtal.desc: Get those just chatting fingers ready for this one! Instead of carousel rounds, vote for what bonus the lobby should get! Get a component anvil after each voting round.

Ixtal.name: Ixaocan
Ixtal.desc: With this portal, everyone loves a reroll player! Each time players star up 20 units, all players gain increasingly valuable loot.

Ixtal.name: Cardinal Arcology
Ixtal.desc: Cardinal Arcology, which will always offer a Prismatic, Gold, and Silver Augment.
